resources.string: Hello, I\'m Happy the Cat. Click Me to hear some motivation.

string-array.name: messages
string-array.item: No matter what is happening, you can get through it. As long as there is a tomorrow you can rest assured good things can happen.
Don\'t forget to hydrate! Drink water.
Go Easy on yourself, give yourself some credit!
You are enough as you are right now.
Aye Sir! Make effort to see the bright side!
Try to have an attitude of gratitude, it may help your mood!
